professional_summary: Experienced Data & Ecommerce Analyst with expertise in data analysis, CRM utilization, and marketplace optimization. Skilled Database Administrator with a focus on SQL Server management and performance tuning.

key_responsibilities: and manage quantitative data to create meaningful reports and key metrics.
Manage various reporting processes including sales outlook and volume/price/mix reporting.

Work closely with management to prioritize business needs.
and optimize listings on multiple marketplaces.
Diagnose SQL Server performance issues using Query Analyzer and Profiler.
